member.name: IMFImageSharingEngineClassFactory.CreateInstanceFromUDN
member.summary: Creates an instance of the from the provided unique device name.
member.param: The unique device name of the device with which the sharing engine is created.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
